dublin_core.dcvalue: Communication is one of the key problems to a central monitoring system In this paper we put forward a central monitoring system using TCP IP as the network protocol Windows NT4 0 as the platform forming a Intranet in a hospital We also discussed the communication problem between the bed side monitoring station and the central monitoring station in detail and then put forward a new protocol Hospital Central Monitor Protocol HCMP based on TCP IP to transfer monitoring data It is easy to achieve tele monitoring through the current communication subsystem
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[Multi-bed And multi-parameter central monitoring system based on TCP/IP protocol].
